## Type of Change

- [ ] New plugin
- [ ] Plugin update/fix
- [ ] Marketplace configuration

## Plugin Checklist

<!-- Complete if adding/modifying a plugin -->

- [ ] Plugin validated locally with `claude plugin validate .`
- [ ] Tested installation with `/plugin marketplace add ./`
- [ ] No credentials or secrets in code
- [ ] No unexpected network calls
- [ ] README/documentation included
- [ ] `marketplace.json` updated (if new plugin)

## Security Review

- [ ] No hardcoded API keys, tokens, or credentials
- [ ] External API calls are to expected/documented endpoints only
- [ ] MCP server permissions are appropriately scoped
- [ ] No arbitrary code execution vulnerabilities
